question: What is the use of Radiotherapy for the treatment of Cancer?
option1: It destroys the tumor by destroying the Cell membranes of the Cancerous Cells
option2: It destroys the tumor by destroying the DNA of the Cancerous Cells
option3: It destroys the tumor by destroying the Cytoplasm of the Cancerous Cells
option4: It destroys the tumor by destroying the spindle fibres which are used in Cell Division
answer: It destroys the tumor by destroying the DNA of the Cancerous Cells
